overview: Four women; Sophia Simmons, Dylan Carter, Portia Fitzgerald and Bridgette Barlow who at the height of their careers are leaders in their industry, discover that having it all is easier said than done. Faced with the challenge of wanting both a professional and a personal life, they realize that life at the top can at times be isolated, and require sacrificing the authority and control they've earned professionally.
title: Being On Top
